content:
Progress

  • Study of Operating System and Hardware Protection mechanisms in the R4000 (w/ Jay Byun)

    • Detailed study of the instruction set
    • Detailed study of operating systems protection mode changes
    • => conclusions for simple RISC processors (designed for Unix style protection structures), other operating systems/processors differ significantly
    • Written report 5/11/98.
    • Basis for formalization of current protection structure, basis for design of a protection structure for adaptable hardware
